description:
Salary: $80k - 120k per year + bonus

Reference: D9PEBD(3-8-24)-1

Business Development Manager

Join our dynamic team as a Business Development Manager, where you'll play a pivotal role in driving growth and fostering strategic partnerships. As a Business Development Manager, you will leverage your exceptional communication and negotiation skills to identify and pursue new business opportunities in the industrial storage solutions sector.

Responsibilities include spearheading market research initiatives, establishing and nurturing client relationships, and collaborating with cross-functional teams. The Business Development Manager will be responsible for analyzing industry trends, developing innovative strategies, and presenting compelling business proposals to potential clients.

The ideal candidate for the Business Development Manager role will:
• Possess a proven track record in achieving sales targets.
• Excellent with developing long term B2B relationships.
• Have a passion for driving revenue growth.
• Lead the charge in identifying and capitalizing on emerging market trends.
• Ensure the sustained success of our business.

Key Qualifications:
• Proven experience as a Business Development Manager in the industrial storage solutions industry.
• Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills.
• Exceptional communication and negotiation abilities.
• Demonstrated success in achieving and exceeding sales targets.
• In-depth knowledge of market trends and competitors.

If you are a results-driven professional with a passion for business development, this Business Development Manager position offers an exciting opportunity to make a significant impact on our company's success. Apply now and be a key player in shaping the future of our organization!

Please submit a resume for consideration. Only the most qualified applicants who provide a resume will be contacted. If you would like to learn more about Manufacturing opportunities, contact Dan Poel with gpac. Resumes can be confidentially sent to dan.poel@gogpac.com

#BusinessDevelopmentManager #BusinessGrowth #StrategicPartnerships #SalesLeadership #Industrial #allentown #PA #pennsylvania #B2B #sales

All qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, age, color, sex (including pregnancy), religion, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, military status, genetic information, or any other status protected by applicable laws or regulations.

GPAC (Growing People and Companies) is an award-winning search firm specializing in placing quality professionals within multiple industries across the United States since 1990. We are extremely competitive, client-focused and realize that our value is in our ability to deliver the right solutions at the right time.
